entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
